definition: governor of Hong Kong (during the period of British rule, 1841-1997)

sentences.english: The road was originally called Robinson Road, to mark the Governor at the time Robinson.
sentences.chinese: 道路原名羅便臣道，以紀念當時港督羅便臣。

sentences.english: So these men are no difference than those former governors at heart.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這些人只不過是內心的前港督的差異。
